title: Premium Trading Dashboard
description: Enterprise-grade trading platform with real-time market data, advanced charting, order management, portfolio analytics, risk assessment tools, and algorithmic trading support.

generation_hints.primary_focus: Real-time data updates and interactive charting
generation_hints.color_usage: Use success for gains, danger for losses, accent for highlights
generation_hints.performance: Optimize for frequent updates, use memo and useMemo
generation_hints.layout_priority: Charts and order book should be prominently displayed
generation_hints.user_flow: Quick access to trading, watchlist, and portfolio
